name: Out of Control(s) (Hauptmann)
description:
A late entry to the GMTK 2020 game jam. Can you beat the game before you loose your control(s)?

DISCLAIMER:
Due to keyboard ghosting, some inputs - like crouch-jumping - might not work with certain key mappings on certain keyboards. 
If this happens to you, try remapping. Using number keys or the spacebar tends to help.

Benjamin Hauptmann:  Lead programmer

Ib Hauptmann: Composer, programmer

Sebastian Hauptmann: Music producer, level design

Isabella Hauptmann: Character sprites
